website_summaries.verdict: A lot to offer for the price: comfort, spaciousness, attractive appearance. Hands down the best sectional on our shortlist.
pros: Soft material, nice padding, stylish design
A large model that provides several seating areas, including a chaise
cons: When it arrives, it may have a chemical odor
After months of use, some owners note that the cushions lose support

website_summaries.verdict: A simple U-shaped sectional with a neutral color to fit in virtually any living or family space without clashing with the surrounding decor.
pros: Extra-large sections provide plenty of space for large groups of people to sit and socialize at the same time
cons: The three-piece frame can break over time

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up to expectations 3 weeks into owning this.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this couch in our home for 22 days. During that time, we were satisfied with the quality given the price of about $1,200.00. However, today when my 93lb daughter sat on the chaise section, we heard something. When checking, there is now a protrusion poking out the back that seems to be some type of bar. It hasn't poked through the fabric yet, but based on how it looks and the location, I think it's just a matter of time until it rips thru.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Was nice and comfy initially but has broken down quite quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Was nice and comfy initially but has broken down quite quickly. 16 months later, heading out to buy a new couch as this one has become a trap... The 4 spots that were used the most sink down whenever sat in now making it a chore just to get up. I actually saw this same couch (pillows and all) at Ashley Furniture. When I mentioned this to the saleswoman, her response was "Oh, yeah, I believe it". Might be good for an extra/sitting room type situation but if used daily, it won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: joeyc

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: falling apart after 30 days I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only had this for 5 months and it’s a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The cushion sinks in after a short time. I’ve only had this for 5 months and it’s a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marjan Arjmand

customer_reviews.title: Structural issues?
customer_reviews.text: While this sofa is soft, no pieces were missing, color was matching the pictures online. My husband sat down on the left side, we were watching some home videos, nothing crazy jumping around, and the support beam broke! It sucks that such a big purchase is broken, again not a rough house to be lived in, he isn't a big guy, very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Burton

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love it! Love it! ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with this sectional!!! Delivered promptly and very well packaged. It is by far the most comfortable living room furniture I've ever owned and with so much room, everyone has a comfy seat. Also, the fabric is very soft. You will not be disappointed!! One tip I can give is to have an electronic drill handy because you will need to attach the feet but easy to do. Also, you will need two people to carry it into your house. It comes in 3 parts that are each pretty big. Just telling you so you're prepared, I'm not complaining in any way! I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: erin black

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get from a good seller
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice as is most of Ashley Furniture. The issue is the way it’s shipped to the house a forklift popped the seem and the seller offered 50 bucks for inconvenience and it took a week to pull that from them. UnusualLy resistant for their mistake. So the seller and their shipping methodology id the issue. Zero on customer service for Metropolitan as a seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality couch, already lots of issues
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the couch for about 7 months and it’s already sagging on the cushions I use most often; I know they’ll start sagging at some point, but they should not this early on. The cushions on top are also sagging, and I’m not sure why that is. The cushions are also squeaking already, alluding to bad springs. Just so many issues so quickly, not happy with it, already considering selling it. Disappointed, I spent a lot of money on this.
customer_reviews.author: lisa e

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, and easy to arrange sectional
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and easy to arrange sectional. The most difficult part was attaching the feet to the bottom, as there are no pre-drilled holes for the screws. I would describe this color as a beige type. But, in certain lighting and or accents/room color it does look grayish. Fabric is soft, super comfy. Took about 30-45 minutes to unpack large boxes. An additional 30 minutes to attach feet and sectional pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: supersaves

customer_reviews.title: Buy this couch!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is so comfortable, I read some of the reviews saying that it's not a lounging couch but it definitely is. We've had this for over 2 months now. it's easy to clean and the fabric feels amazing. It's super big but so cozy at the same time. We love this couch! We have the Dune color and it goes well with Browns and grays is extremely versatile.
customer_reviews.author: VNGO

customer_reviews.title: Couch missing feet.
customer_reviews.text: Couch is beautiful and comfortable but we are missing roughly 8 feet. Trying to resolve this issue was told to post picture with the serial number as the seller doesn't manufacture this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Good couch so far. Goid experiance
customer_reviews.text: Overall its a nice couch. The cusions are firm and it looks close to the color seen online. It might be more brown for the dune color but happy with it. I was hesitant on ordering it online but it turned out to be a good experience. The feet have to be put on but that was easy. It also arived in boxes and would fit threw my front door. Its standard.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Completely love this couch.
customer_reviews.text: It came on time. They called an hour before arriving which was so nice and helpful. The delivery guy was so accommodating and helped my husband bring it up the back stairs and in box it, even though it was pouring rain. The couch was simple to put together and not too heavy. We scotch guarded it to help protect it fromy toddler, dogs, and cats. So far it's standing up to them and is so comfortable. It is firm and soft. Comes with two pillows also. I was surprised and happy. So far I love this couch.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sofa!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sofa! Very comfortable, seats our large family easily. Scheduling the delivery time was also fantastic through Amazon check-out.
customer_reviews.author: Rlbell

customer_reviews.title: We have been really happy with this couch
customer_reviews.text: We have been really happy with this couch. It's very comfy and the color is as described. We purchased the chocolate brown. It arrived on the delivery date indicated and it really was a smooth purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this sofa!! It is big, super soft and oh so comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Fabric
customer_reviews.text: Great sectional. The fabric feels thick and not cheap. fits together nice and is comfortable. The seats don't appear deep enough but when you sit you cannot tell. But the largest piece wont fit down into my basement!
customer_reviews.author: Charis

customer_reviews.title: This is the type of couch that I ordered but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the type of couch that I ordered but it is in the wrong shape. The lounging part of the couch is on the wrong side so it doesn't fit in my living room the way that it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick hoeltge

customer_reviews.title: Very happy! :)
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is a great buy! We were hesitant to purchase furniture online but are definitely glad we did. This sectional is a great deal. The fabric is a soft, pebbled microsuede and the cushions are firm with the right amount of give. It's large enough to fit quite a few people comfortably. We couldn't be happier! :)
customer_reviews.author: CareBear85

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy how comfortable it is, and VERY easy assembly, and holds to wood floors fairly well w/out sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Buy this couch!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is a great buy. Very sturdy and comfortable. Amazon delivered right to my door the drive was very helpful in helping me unpackage it. All you have to assemble are the feet which easily screw in. The sections attach very easily. Lots of room on this couch for a whole family to enjoy. The cushions are all removable and the cushion covers come off and can be washed on a gentle cycle in the washing machine. I was reluctant to by a couch of Amazon but I couldn't be more pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: John O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in great shape and I am happy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in great shape and I am happy. It was delivered a few days after the original delivery timeframe, but very reasonable price and the seller stayed in contact with me the whole time so I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: John Pollak

customer_reviews.title: Comfy soft material, large, and easy delivery
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft and it is a very large sectional. Can have 3 people lay easily. Price is worth the quality. Amazon delivered it perfectly and on time. Came in 3 separate pieces that easily connect. Had 2 professional movers move it in for me but I had to unwrap and connect together.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about ordering a couch online, but this couch exactly what i hoped for and more!!. There is enough room for the whole family and the cat and dog. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: But I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Well I just got it today and if you live up stairs in an apartment I hope you neighbor is home so they can open there front door so you can fit it into your apartment the one part of this is long. But I am very happy with it. It is pretty comfy definitely can see my self falling asleep on it I would recommend this to one of my friends
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new couch. So comfortable! Color was a match too, nice and dark brown
customer_reviews.author: Mike Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfy couch! Very large as well! Shipping was fast and easy had a lost piece that came a couple days later but not that big of a deal! Would recommend for anyone looking for a family or great room piece! We use as an entertainment room sitting area! Love it! Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality......broken in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Terribly made. All of the plastic legs on the center piece of the sectional have pushed up into the couch itself. Now the center piece is directly on the floor and won’t properly attach to the right an left sections.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Macri

customer_reviews.title: Great Sectional Super Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Super SOFT and comfortable ! It's firm enough to provide support but comfy enough to take naps on lol. One of the reviewers was right, it's not really for lounging. However, I'm small (5'6"- 130lbs) so it's perfect and the ottoman more than makes up for the shorter seat cushions. This is a beautiful couch. I got the sand colored which is like a dull brown lol that's the only thing I could think of
customer_reviews.author: Sheena E

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful comfortable couch!
customer_reviews.text: I was very very skeptical on buying any couch online. I looked through many couches and read every rating and decided on this one. I am so so happy with it. It came yesterday, the last day on the expected dates. They called and set up the delivery to make sure I'd be here. The color is such a beautiful rich chocolate and the material is so soft and so comfortable. All I wanted to do was lay on it. I HIGHLY recommend getting the ottoman too. It definitely wouldn't be the same without it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Instant comfort
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is so soft and cozy, we love it It is very big so you will need a large living room to put this one
customer_reviews.author: SherriMac

customer_reviews.title: Couch is super comfortable/cozy! Comes with 1 pillow (as seen in ...
customer_reviews.text: Couch is super comfortable/cozy! Comes with 2 pillows (as seen in picture). FYI - you'll have to screw in the plastic pegs at the bottom of the couch. So far we love it!!! Great family couch for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: This sofa smells! Our family woke up with headache ...
customer_reviews.text: This sofa smells! Our family woke up with headache this morning since this sofa was put in place yesterday - it must made out of cheep material with cheep glue! if you care about your health, don't introducd this toxic stuff into your home - I'm also returning the end table from the same brand - it smells even more, my 12-year son was caughing while he was helping me to assemble the end table!
customer_reviews.author: 3lu2005

customer_reviews.title: ashley
customer_reviews.text: this is not actually Flash furniture it is Ashley brand which can be bought for around 900-1100 elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: acorn gamer HD

customer_reviews.title: Big and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this couch for about four months and we love it. There is not an uncomfortable spot on this couch! I love the dark color, it looks very clean. We have three dogs (small, medium, and large) that are always lounging. We have had about six people and the dogs on the couch at one time at it was perfect. The couch is also easy to clean, I vacuum it about once every two weeks and if there is anything on it I will use warm water, sometimes with dish soap. I love the dark color, the material is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nova90

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable for large family!
customer_reviews.text: I had this sofa for a few years. And I’ve got to say I absolutely loved it! It was very very comfortable and can easily seat a family of 5 without feeling crowded, especially with the ottoman to rest your feet on. My kids were by no means easy in this furniture, but it held up very nicely. When the seats became dirty we unzipped the cushion covers and threw them in the wash and they came out good as new. The only complaints I can possibly think of is that it is heavy and I personally would prefer a different color, otherwise I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Mama23

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Ashley sectional is absolute garbage. 1 year later and we're having to shop for new furniture because the upholstery is shot, the cushions have deflated and the frame couldn't hold up to a 250lb man. Don't waste your time or money on Ashley furniture, it is abominable.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ramz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy This Sectional
customer_reviews.text: Was nice and comfy initially but has broken down quite quickly. 11 months later, heading out to buy a new couch as this one has become a trap... The 4 spots that were used the most sink down whenever sat in now making it a chore just to get up. I waited years to buy a sectional and now I feel like I threw away $1200 because I have to replace after less than a year. Might be good for an extra/sitting room type situation but if used daily, it won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Added the extra piece and it's the perfect size. Any other sectional this large would've cost over $3000! Only con so far is that the back of the chaise seemed to come a little less "puffy" and more worn-out looking than the other pieces of the couch
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this now for one year and am very satisfied. I have two 70lb dogs that get on the furniture, I haven’t noticed any damage at all. I’ve slept on the couch for weeks at a time and cushions have not worn down. When I purchased this couch I paid about $1000 and have been satisfied with the value
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten D.

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable and decent looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Jessa Place sectional directly from Ashley Furniture, the chocolate color. It goes very well with my beige carpet. It's very comfortable and decent looking. One of the sears sinks in lower than expected when you sit on it, but I'm okay with that. I love my purchase and I think I got it at a reasonable price. (I paid $999 + delivery)
customer_reviews.author: sw

customer_reviews.title: PRICE ??????
customer_reviews.text: 798.00 at living spaces many location and states mine in Rancho Cucamonga ca But it wont hold you if you're over 200 lbs they are made cheap like Big lots furniture from Mexico.Dont sit in the middle. May last a few years if you're lucky just pay the 2k + for quality furniture if you want a sectional to last.
customer_reviews.author: vincent clark

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley Jessa Place Sectional in Chocolate Fabric
product_meta.description: Color:ChocolateWith the ample seating area of this comfortable sectional making sure that everyone has the best seat in the house, the stylish contemporary design of the ''Jesse Place-Chocolate'' upholstery collection features oversized set-back rolled arms along with supportive seat and back cushioning all surrounded with a plush upholstery fabric.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
